name: Taint - A LD42 Game
description:
This is my LD42  game Taint, submitted for Jam, created by PYJA and KATB. The theme of the competition was running out of space, and we fulfilled this by having a spreading corruption chasing you away, and enemies constantly producing high damage dealing corruption. This can be swiped away with your broom.

Controls : 

LMB - MELEE

RMB - RANGED

WASD - MOVE

SPACE - JUMP

"F" - Fly / Swap to Run
